subject: Doping (Sports)
Football
Athletics and Sports
Smuggling
lead_paragraph: Washington receiver Santana Moss had planned for treatment by Anthony Galea when Galea’s assistant was arrested for smuggling unapproved drugs into the United States.
snippet: Washington receiver Santana Moss had planned for treatment by Anthony Galea when Galea’s assistant was arrested for smuggling unapproved drugs into the United States.
